name: neko-butcher
description:
One night the dark spirit came to an abandoned house, no one there but the turntable on the corner is spinning a song from Mayhem - Deathcrush album. On the other sight, the dark spirit found a maneki-neko figurine waving its ceramic hand. What a mixed nuance of a night. Then, the dark spirit intrigued to possess the maneki-neko and turned it into black metal and called itself the "Neko-butcher" *rumbling thunder sound effect*

~~~

Metaru-neko is a series of fictional character about metalhead cats with various background story. The nekos will come in different style and posse.
May the metaru-neko bring you lots of luck and keep smoking metal engine!
